title: Know on the Third Morning - Novel Updates
tags: Dense Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Knights   Loyal Subordinates   Medieval   Oneshot   Possessive Characters   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Secret Crush
author: Shiina   シイナ   秕
description: Dee, who reincarnated in the game world that he was addicted to in his previous life, was satisfied just by looking at Captain Leonardo, who was his favorite, from a distance as a member. One day, he was elected as a new unit and decided to be transferred from Leonardo's unit. The next morning when Dee was drunk with a drink that was held as a promotion celebration, Dee woke up and saw Leonardo in front of him. Or rather, there was a Leonardo's thing in it. * This is an erotic story.>
